---
title: "package.json"
---

## High-level description
This `package.json` file defines the configuration and metadata for the `base64-js` npm package. It provides information about the package's name, version, author, dependencies, scripts, and other relevant details for a Node.js module that handles Base64 encoding and decoding in pure JavaScript.

## Symbols

### Package Metadata
#### Description
The top-level fields in the JSON object provide essential information about the package.

| Name | Value | Description |
|:-----|:------|:------------|
| name | "base64-js" | The name of the npm package |
| description | "Base64 encoding/decoding in pure JS" | A brief description of the package's functionality |
| version | "1.5.1" | The current version of the package |
| author | "T. Jameson Little &lt;t.jameson.little@gmail.com&gt;" | The author of the package |
| typings | "index.d.ts" | The location of TypeScript type definitions |
| main | "index.js" | The main entry point of the package |
| license | "MIT" | The license under which the package is distributed |

### Scripts
#### Description
Defines various npm scripts for development, testing, and building.

| Name | Command | Description |
|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| build | "browserify -s base64js -r ./ \| minify &gt; base64js.min.js" | Builds a minified browser-compatible version of the package |
| lint | "standard" | Runs the standard linter on the codebase |
| test | "npm run lint && npm run unit" | Runs both linting and unit tests |
| unit | "tape test/*.js" | Runs unit tests using the tape testing framework |

### DevDependencies
#### Description
Lists the development dependencies required for building, testing, and maintaining the package.

| Dependency | Version | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|:--------|
| babel-minify | "^0.5.1" | Used for minification in the build process |
| benchmark | "^2.1.4" | Likely used for performance benchmarking |
| browserify | "^16.3.0" | Used to create browser-compatible bundles |
| standard | "*" | Linting tool for maintaining code quality |
| tape | "4.x" | Testing framework for unit tests |

### Repository
#### Description
Specifies the type and URL of the source code repository.

```json
"repository": {
  "type": "git",
  "url": "git://github.com/beatgammit/base64-js.git"
}
```

"funding": [

## Dependencies
This package does not list any runtime dependencies, indicating that it is likely a self-contained implementation without external requirements.
